- Front fa√ßade: 1-story ranch with brick veneer; white vinyl-framed windows; centered entry door with brick stoop.

- Driveway: Concrete driveway to front door; surface cracking and minor spalling; potential trip/maintenance item.

- Roof: Asphalt shingle roof; no obvious damage from this view; inspect for age-related wear and any loose/ curling shingles.

- Entry/stairs: Concrete brick-faced steps with no handrail; safety/access concern.

- Yard/fence: Left-side wooden privacy fence appears weathered but intact; lawn is patchy; check grading and vegetation near foundation.
